de.cancelled-body: Ausfall bei {teachers}, in {subjects}, in der {lesson-number}. Stunde
de.moved-body: Die {from-lesson-number}. Stunde bei {teachers} in {subjects} wird zur {to-lesson-number}. Stunde umverlegt
de.not-cancelled-body: KEIN Ausfall bei {teachers}, in {subjects}, in der {lesson-number}. Stunde
de.not-moved-title: {from-lesson-number}. Stunde wird NICHT zur {to-lesson-number}. Stunde umverlegt
de.not-moved-body: Die {from-lesson-number}. Stunde bei {teachers} wird NICHT zur {to-lesson-number}. Stunde umverlegt

en.cancelled-body: The {lesson-number}. lesson with {teachers} in {subjects} is cancelled
en.moved-title: The {from-lesson-number}. lesson is moved to {to-lesson-number}. lesson
en.moved-body: The {from-lesson-number}. lesson with {teachers} in {subjects} is moved to the {to-lesson-number}. lesson
en.not-cancelled-body: The {lesson-number}. lesson with {teachers} in {subjects} is NOT cancelled
en.not-moved-title: The {from-lesson-number}. lesson is NOT moved to {to-lesson-number}.
en.not-moved-body: The {from-lesson-number}. lesson with {teachers} in {subjects} is NOT moved to the {to-lesson-number}. lesson
